    • Constructor Detail

      • Peer

        public Peer(java.lang.String hostToConnect,
    int portToConnect,
    java.lang.String sharedFolder,
    java.lang.String downloadsFolder)
        Peer constructor to create a Peer for a specific host, port, shared folder and downloads folder
        Parameters:
        hostToConnect - host of a known peer to connect to
        portToConnect - peer of a known peer to connect to
        sharedFolder - location of the folder to share
        downloadsFolder - location of the download files
